settings.title: Live Shopping
settings.description: Tune in live to shop with the guidance of CALPAK experts, learn more about fan favorite pieces, access exclusive discounts, and more.

settings.title: 1-to-1 Live Shopping
settings.text:
What to expect from our custom-tailored Virtual Stylist appointments:
• Receive a 30min stress-free shopping experience where our Stylists are able to show you our products, virtually via Zoom. (Don't worry, you do not have to have your camera on.)

• The 30min time slot is really yours to explore our product line and ask any questions you may have in regard to CALPAK products, sizing, or colorways.

• Your stylist will be able to make product suggestions, based on your needs and style.

• After your appointment, your stylist will follow up via email with a customized cart that will include your CALPAK items of interest. Simply checkout via your preferred payment method.
